page.title: 15MY LAST DAY AT INFANT SCHOOL
page.content: I HAVE JUST HAD MY LAST DAY AT THE INFANT'S SCHOOL AND NEXT YEAR I AM GOING TO BLACK COMBE JUNIOR SCHOOL. MY FAVOURITE LESSON WAS PE. I LIKED BIG APPARATUS WHEN WE GOT THE CLIMBING FRAME AND THE SLIDE OUT. ON OUR TRIP THIS YEAR WE WENT TO LOTS OF PLACES. WE TRAVELLED ON A COACH TO BOWNESS, A STEAMER TO LAKESIDE, A STEAM TRAIN TO HAVERTHWAITE, THEN ON AN OLD BUS TO HOLKER HALL. THE BUS WAS THIRTY YEARS OLD. AT HOLKER HALL WE SAW THE MOTOR MUSEUM AND PLAYED IN THE ADVENTURE PARK. WE LOOKED AROUND THE CHILDREN'S FARM. IT COST SIX POUNDS FOR ALL OF THE TRIP. I LIKE DOING PICTURES IN THE AFTERNOON AND PLAYING WITH TOYS. I LIKE DOING WORK SOMETIMES, DOING MATHS BUT I DON'T LIKE DOING THE REST OF THE THINGS. MY BROTHER GOES TO MY NEW SCHOOL AND MY DAD IS A TEACHER THERE.
